enemies.name: Earth Elemental
enemies.resistances: Bludgeoning, Piercing, Slashing from nonmagical attacks
enemies.immunities: Poison; Exhaustion, Paralyzed, Petrified, Poisoned, Unconscious
enemies.senses: Darkvision 60 ft., Tremorsense 60 ft., Passive Perception 10

traits.name: Earth Glide
traits.description: Can burrow through nonmagical unworked earth/stone without disturbing it.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.description: Double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +8, reach 10 ft. Hit: 14 (2d8+5) Bludgeoning damage.

enemies.name: Tarrasque
enemies.immunities: Fire, Poison; Charmed, Frightened, Paralyzed, Poisoned

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.description: If fails a save, can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Reflective Carapace
traits.description: Targeted by magic missile, line spell, or spell requiring ranged attack: d6. 1-5 = no effect. 6 = reflected at caster as if from tarrasque.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.description: Double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: Five attacks: one Bite, two Claws, one Horn, and one Tail. Can use Swallow instead of Bite.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +19, reach 10 ft. Hit: 36 (4d12+10) Piercing. Target Grappled (escape DC 20) if Huge or smaller, Restrained until grapple ends.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +19, reach 15 ft. Hit: 28 (4d8+10) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Horn
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +19, reach 10 ft. Hit: 32 (4d10+10) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +19, reach 20 ft. Hit: 24 (4d6+10) Bludgeoning. DC 20 STR or Prone.

actions.name: Swallow
actions.description: One Grappled Large or smaller creature. Target Blinded, Restrained, Total Cover, 56 (16d6) Acid at start of tarrasque's turns. If tarrasque takes 60+ damage in one turn from inside, DC 20 CON or regurgitates all swallowed creatures (Prone within 10 ft).

legendaryActions.name: Attack
legendaryActions.description: Makes one Claw or Tail attack.

legendaryActions.name: Chomp (2 Actions)
legendaryActions.description: Makes one Bite attack or uses Swallow.

enemies.name: Druid

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +2, reach 5 ft. Hit: 3 (1d6) Bludgeoning, or 4 (1d8) two-handed.

enemies.notes: Spellcasting (DC 12, +4): Cantrips: druidcraft, produce flame, shillelagh. 1st (4 slots): entangle, longstrider, speak with animals, thunderwave. 2nd (3 slots): animal messenger, barkskin.
